long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An alternate playlist view for Spotify

Usage:

To switch into leppard view:
  - Once you've chosen your album/playlist:
  - Click on the leppard icon to the right of the URL

To get out of leppard view:
  - Hit the escape key

To play/stop playing:
  - Space bar

To go to next song:
    - Right arrow OR left alt key on a Macbook

To go to the previous song:
  - Left arrow OR left alt key on a Macbook
